item.title: SCAPERUNE I quit v6 [508] RD BASE - PK POINTS - PKSHOPS - minigame MANY MORE!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

@echo off
@color 0b
@title ScapeRune 513: Port 43594
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_14\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
pause)
then the last one in the list is just “runserver” and it says
(@echo off
@color 0b
@title ScapeRune 513 AutoRestart
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
pause

Is what needs to be in there…
You also need to Do that to the Variables but if its to hard then Downloads Lins Variable Setter in the Download Section…
Its Stickied

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @donkader donkader
item.description:
@donkader wrote:

ok so in my java folder there are 4 folders
the first is
jdk1.6.0_14
jre1.6.0_05
jre1.6.0_07
then the last file is jre6 and when i go to edit on the batch files (there are like 5 of them) i looked at the one that says “runserver port 43594” it says
(@echo off
@color 0b
@title ScapeRune 513: Port 43594
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
pause)
then the last one in the list is just “runserver” and it says
(@echo off
@color 0b
@title ScapeRune 513 AutoRestart
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
pause)

item.title: SCAPERUNE I quit v6 [508] RD BASE - PK POINTS - PKSHOPS - minigame MANY MORE!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

donkader:

im sorry, im new to this stuff er… how do i do that?

Right click you’re Run.bat and click edit…

To figure out which version of Java you have… using Windows go to My Computer/C Drive/Programme Files/Java and memorize the Numbers on the end of the Java File. If it says something like 1.6.0_12 then in the Run.Bat edit the Java Number in the Run.bat Edit.

If you cant figure it out tell me which Java Version you have then Ill do it for you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“donkader, post:26, topic:288736”]i get this when i try to run ther server.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/espeon/Server

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.espeon.Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: net/com/espeon/Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

does anyone know what is wrong?[/quote]
I dont think it can find the Files net.com.espeon.Server
Try changing the Java Version or something

Read full topic
